name: Space Miner Blast
description:
Now updated with Universal support, new balance changes, and no more ads or IAP! Buy it once, enjoy it forever!

Venan Entertainment's critically-acclaimed SPACE MINER series returns in this action-packed arcade spin-off! Blast gigantic asteroids, dodge enemy fire, and suck up priceless ore as you try to make it to the top of the worldwide leaderboards and become the best SPACE MINER in the universe!

And be sure to check out Space Miner: Space Ore Bust, named 2010 iPhone Game Of The Year by Touch Arcade!

Space Miner II will be coming, but in the meantime, have a BLAST!

UNIVERSAL SUPPORT AND RETINA DISPLAY GRAPHICS!
All the amazing special effects you've come to expect from a SPACE MINER title have been cranked to ELEVEN Apple's incredible Retina Display. And if you really want to be impressed, play it on the iPad, you won't want to go back!

FULL GAME CENTER SUPPORT!
Think you're the best Space Miner in the world? Prove it on our in-game leaderboards! Add 25 Game Center achievements into the mix and we guarantee you'll be blasting asteroids until the sun comes up!

UPGRADES AND POWER-UPS APLENTY!
Add extra guns, max out your shielding, and improve your ore collector to get even MORE money from the ore you pick up! Fly circles around your foes by picking up Reflector Shields, Smart Bombs, Weapon Overloads, and the ore-granting Jackpot!

FOUR DIFFERENT SHIPS!
Four different ships, each with their own unique stats! Do you go for firepower, defense, high scores or a balanced approach? See which play style scores you the most ore!

GRAB THAT ORE!
Every piece of ore you grab could be the start of a score-topping MEGA COMBO! Collect ore quickly enough and you'll kick off a combo multiplier. Keep sucking it up and you'll keep the combo alive!
